Text: Thank you for hearing me! You are the man :)
only the first 20 min have subtitles, the rest of teh parts seems dont, :(

Okay so, I never had issues with any torrent so far, games, movies, music, etc.
I'm far from a noob.

I'm using Media Player Classic - Home Cinema.
After the nuclear blast intro, I hear music and the screen goes black.
No Menu... 

hmm... What kind of fuckery is this? ._. 
Am I drunk?

^ Solved. 
On Media Player Classic -Home Cinema;

Fullscreen.
Options -> Navigate -> Root Menu. 

Then the Image on the Menu appears as well and not just the background music. 

Played lots of DvD movies (With the Video_ts folder) and even Image Files, and nothing like this ever happened...

Owell, Minor glitch (: 

Thanks for the Content Uploader.

You shall receive my +1 .
